what do you look fot inside the cheap radios to mod? is it a mute function,=
 or do you have to build a circuit for tuning?
  ----- Original Message ---=
-- 
  From: Frank Sumption 
  To: Group 
  Sent: Wednesday, August 13, 2008=
 2:54 PM
  Subject: [EVP-ITC] The Frankenator


  Yet another thrift store =
radio, a "digital" AM/FM/CD player. It has the advanrage of already existin=
g audio amplifiers, and line in and out. I gutted the CD portion so I can a=
dd a sweep board. This thing was made in 2006, so my assumption that newer =
radio would be unusable is incorrect, as well as my thought that I had to u=
se car tuners, which are pure C-R-A-P!
   
   Ftank-s
